basic_info.description: I'm Alan Chelko. I'm a fullstack JavaScript developer and US Army veteran with over 20 years experience working in venture capital or on the management side in early stage environments.

projects.title: Space Invaders
projects.description: A semi-faithful recreation of the 1978 arcade video game classic, Space Invaders -- built with JavaScript, HTML and pure CSS.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: Mock business site of company selling salmon cookies -- built with JavaScript, HTML and pure CSS.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: Mock business of company called Odd Duck conducting a product test via an interactive web page offering an opportunity to vote on various products -- built with JavaScript, HTML and pure CSS.
